website_summaries.verdict: Designed for a pet-pleasing shower experience. Great for dogs as well as humans.
pros: No plumbing necessary, connects to existing shower head
Offers 3 settings and great water flow with each
cons: Shower head not included and holder may seem a bit small to fit sprayer

customer_reviews.title: Must be defective because it leaks. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I think I must have gotten a defective one. Followed directions exactly - I tried 5 times and no matter what - it leaks. I’ve installed shower heads before so it wasn’t hard - but no matter what it leaks water when it’s on. After the 4th try I even tried to tighten with a wrench and cloth so it wouldn’t damage the finish - still leaking. The concept is great, and it will definitely reach even my dogs feet, as long as I can get a non leaky one. I will return it for a replacement and hope that one works so I can modify my review.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Changed our bathing lives!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my life in bathing my dog! It was easy to install and looks as great as it works. It’s light weight, yet plastic looking chrome but so far so good! It has not leaked and I’ve even used it to wash my granddaughters hair. The owner of company personally emailed to check in my satisfaction with it and offered help if I had any trouble. Wow! Even the packaging was first class. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: seashellbelle

customer_reviews.title: Works but the wand falls out alot. Wish I had found one easier to use.
customer_reviews.text: This item was quick and easy to install, and made quite well. I had a problem with the handheld not fitting into the mounting bracket and left a lower rating. The company contacted me and told me I needed to reverse the hose attachments. I had them on wrong and once I put them on the right way the handheld sloped into the mounting bracket correctly. I wanted to let others know because I saw at least 2 other people who had made the mistake I did. Obviously the company cares about its feedback because they contacted me right away.
customer_reviews.author: gloria trier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, can control water pressure so it can be gental water. We use it to shower my kid. This is much better than the other expensive one I bought for almost 200 bucks. After I got this, I threw the other one away. The other one seems fancy with 5 adjustment levels, but everytime I was scared as I was not sure which level it was on and scared of a sudden strong water coming out. This one only has 3 levels and it is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shower combination for people and pets.

customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Maintains Waterpressure
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shower head for the convenience of bathing our dog. The handicap head reaches all the way to the end of the tub, and has a switch on the handle to control flow of water. This is great for temporary turn off of the water while maintaining the perfect temperature. It also has different setting for outflow--I don't use them but they are there. The mounting piece was super easy to install, and the diverter has a nice "chunk" as another reviewer stated, when switching between the settings. Our water pressure has not been affected! It has also made it easy to rinse the shower after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: No more dirty water dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super freaking great. Way easy to install and the plumbers tape is included. My dog loves taking a bath but hates the pouring of water from a tiny bucket over her for preparing and rinsing. This make my life and hers way more easy. She is a shop dog so she turns bath water black all the time and now I can do all the washing she needs without her sitting in her own shop dirt water. Her name is “Taco the shop dog and she gives it five stars as well. Also you can start and stop the water as well as control the water release directly from the handle. Love it!!!!

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
